subject: CERN's LHC ready Summer '08!
author: Kristin
full_text:
http://press.web.cern.ch/press/PressReleases/Releases2008/PR02.08E.html
Looks like CERN will be putting their LHC (Large Hadron Collider) to
the test this summer!  

Who knows what they will discover???  Other dimensions, parallel
universes?
